SA15dhksparu:83: pāratantryaṃ hi sambandhaḥ siddhe kā paratantratā
SA15dhksparu:84: tasmāt sarvasya bhāvasya sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:85: rūpa-śleṣo hi sambandho dvitve sa ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhksparu:86: tasmāt prakṛti-bhinnānāṃ sambandho na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhksparu:87: para-apekṣā hi sambandhaḥ so asan katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:88: saṃś ca sarva-nirāśaṃso bhāvaḥ katham apekṣate
SA15dhksparu:90: kaḥ sambandho anavasthā ca na sambandha-matis tathā
SA15dhksparu:91: tau ca bhāvau tad-anyaś ca sarve te sva-ātmani sthitāḥ
SA15dhksparu:92: ity amiśrāḥ svayaṃ bhāvās tān miśrayati kalpanā
SA15dhksparu:96: prasiddhyati kathaṃ dviṣṭho adviṣṭhe sambandhatā katham
SA15dhksparu:98: tadbhāve api tad-bhāvāt sambandho na eka-vṛttimān
SA15dhksparu:99: yady apekṣya tayor ekam anyatra asau pravartate
SA15dhksparu:100: upakārī hy apekṣyaḥ syāt kathaṃ ca upakaroty asan
SA15dhksparu:103: dviṣṭho hi kaścit sambandho na ato anyat tasya lakṣaṇam
SA15dhksparu:105: yoga-upādhī na tāv eva kāryakāraṇatā atra kim
SA15dhksparu:106: bhedāc cen nanv ayaṃ śabdo niyoktāraṃ samāśritaḥ
SA15dhksparu:108: apaśyat kāryam anveti vinā vyākhyātṛbhir janaḥ
SA15dhksparu:113: bhāve bhāvini tad-bhāvo bhāva eva ca bhāvitā
SA15dhksparu:116: vikalpā darśayanty arthān mithyā-arthā ghaṭitān iva
SA15dhksparu:117: bhinne kā ghaṭanā abhinne kāryakāraṇatā api kā
SA15dhksparu:118: bhāve hy anyasya viśliṣṭau śilaṣṭau syātāṃ kathaṃ ca tau
SA15dhksparu:120: anyonya-anupakārāc ca na sambandhī ca tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhksparu:121: janane api hi kāryasya kenacit samavāyinā
SA15dhksparu:122: samavāyī tadā na asau na tato atiprasaṅgataḥ
SA15dhksparu:123: tayor anupakāre api samavāye paratra vā
SA15dhksparu:124: sambandho yadi viśvaṃ syāt samavāyi parasparam
SA15dhksparu:125: saṃyoga-janane api iṣṭau tataḥ saṃyoginau na tau
SA15dhksparu:127: saṃyoga-ādy-āśraye yogyam ayogyaṃ tac ca jāyate
SA15dhksparu:131: teṣu satsv api tasya iti sambandhasya aprasiddhitaḥ
